website_summaries.verdict: If you want to make bath time more relaxing and comfortable than ever, this thick pillow is made to deliver.
pros: Made of two soft, thick foam panels that are supportive yet super comfortable
Top panel is very supportive of the head and neck
Structured to fit most types of tubs
Backed by a customer satisfaction guarantee
cons: Material is prone to mildew if you don't spread it out to dry after use
Suction cups are better than most, but won't work on all tub surfaces

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally treated myself
customer_reviews.text: As a tired mom whose main form of self care comes from sporadic long baths, I’m mad at myself for having this on my wishlist so long before I bought it as it’s really not expensive and so worth the price. Our tub is old and it was weird laying my head at the end of it, my neck would always start hurting quickly. Not anymore. I love this bath pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: FRAGRANCED - I can't even use it
customer_reviews.text: This product REEKS of perfume! I opened the box and immediately was met with a cloud of perfume. It made me really sick. I'm very very sensitive to perfume, and if a manufacturer is going to sell a product, they really need to specify when it's fragranced. I have a medical condition that's affected by perfume, and I'm in a lot of pain now. Will be forced to have someone else send it back for me. I can't even get near it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy taking baths you need one of these! This pillow is great, it has supportive foam with a mesh covering. It dries quickly, hasn’t stained from my bath products, and is still in wonderful condition. The bath pillow stays in place once you put it where you want it. It is so comfortable to lean against and it's easy to clean. I fall asleep in my bath when I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: As someone who loves a good bath to unwind at the end of the week
customer_reviews.text: Whyyyyy did I not get one of these sooner?? As someone who loves a good bath to unwind at the end of the week, this pillow is a perfect addition to the experience. My tub is a standard normal shower/tub, and has almost no lip, going straight up to the shower wall. This pillow makes everything 10x more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is large enough to provide comfort for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is large enough to provide comfort for my entire upper back. I've had a couple surgeries already for degenerative disc disease so comfort is really important to me in my bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Bashful

customer_reviews.title: Moldy pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bath pillow because it said '"DURABLE and EASY CARE: Are you tired of mold and mildew..... Our ANTI-BACTERIAL mesh material allows water & air to flow through the washable bath pillow. This allows quick drying." Not true. Never stayed clean and would mold. Finally tried washing weekly with little help. Would continue to mold. Very gross for a 'luxury' bathtub pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Williams

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get soggy. Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Super clean and easy to use! See photos for big suction cups on back that keep it in place. It's nice that it looks nice, but what's most impressive is how nice it feels when you're in the bath (sorry no photos). It doesn't get all mushy and gross. It stays comfy and not soggy. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Great spa pillow for large tubs
customer_reviews.text: Such a comfy bath pillow and I love the fact that it is bigger than most. This pillow does have good suction but does most some of water gets too much underneath. (My kids can be rough) The support is also wonderful for my big tub which is what I have been looking for. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at its staying power
customer_reviews.text: I was sure this would slip into the water after a while of a heavy head laying on it but nope, it stays where you put it! Totally awesome, you could lay on it for an hour plus and never have to readjust it. Its soft enough to be comfortable but with a firm structured design so you know it won't just fall apart. I've never had another bath pillow to compare to, and I'll never buy another one because this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay in place very well. I am always having to adjust. I have a regular tub, not one with a back slant. So that is probably the reason why the pillow doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Luxury bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a fair number of other bath pillows - decided to treat myself to this one for Christmas. I wasn't sure about the hook on it as I usually just leave my bath pillows attached to the tub, but I really like that feature to hang it up on my towel rack when not in use - that way it doesn't stay constantly wet when we have showers in between. It is very comfortable and supports my neck when I am reading in the bath. I like the 4 suction cups as they seem to hold the pillow in place without any slippage.
customer_reviews.author: L D

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a very uncomfortable bathtub with virtually no room to lean your head back. I have tried other pillows with no luck. I was a little skeptical of the price of this pillow but I am very pleasantly surprised at how well it changed the comfort of my tub. The only thing I will say is the suction cups could be stronger but it is definitely not a deal breaker. I would definitely recommend over other pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Haley

customer_reviews.title: Very thick, suction cups are junk.
customer_reviews.text: update: this thing is a waste of money. I literally slide down during every bath and don’t realize it till my face is almost submerged. Wish I never bought this. There are better products for half the money.
customer_reviews.author: dev6757

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfortable Pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only had this for a week so I can’t speak for it’s durability or longevity however, boy is this pillow comfortable!!!! It supports the neck and shoulders really well. Because the cushion is thick (hence the level of comfort) it absorbs the water a lot but I squeeze them as much as I can, and hang in the bathroom to let the extra water drip. Then I move it to a flat laundry rack. It dries pretty quickly. I looked at many different bath pillows before purchasing and I’m so glad I chose this one!! I now take bath more frequently and longer.
customer_reviews.author: sukilalala

customer_reviews.title: Love long baths? You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my wish list for months, thought the price was steep for such an extraneous bath accessory, then one day I just said, Damn it, I deserve some relaxation! And I am really impressed! the cushion is really thick and comfortable, and it fits my standard bathtub perfectly so the bottom of the cushion touches the bottom of the tub and the pillow is just over the lip of the tub, perfect for putting your head back. So pumped about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lilaabean

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable bath Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Loved my spa pillow! It came in on time. Used it for the first time last week and it was so comfortable! The suction was very strong and was so easy to clean and store. The hook feature on the pillow was a great feature since it allowed me to hang dry the pillow as soon as I was done with my pillow. This allowed my spa pillow to dry faster which prevents mildew from forming on the pillow. Would definitely recommend. A very solid product and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: DHS

customer_reviews.title: Sqeezing out & hanging promptly works so well!  :)
customer_reviews.text: It makes my ancient, small bathtub much more comfortable.....I love the hook that came as a surprise and allows me to hang it for drying....it dries quickly if squeezed and hung.....so far it has really improved my relaxing bath time! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: John Ruhl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Comfort, Suction Cups Are A Problem
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this product and would probably buy again. That said, please know that the suction cups are likely to pull off of the foam. In other words, when the suction is attached to the tub and you try to pull the foam pillow off, I had two suction cups tear off of the foam. Perhaps this is my fault, but it should be easier to get the foam pillow off the tub without having to pull so hard...but if you do, then the foam should be stronger as to not lose the suction cup altogether. I like the comfort and stability, but the brand has some work to do in terms of user-friendliness.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Best. Thing. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth trying to decide which pillow to order and then my husband finally pulled the trigger on this one. I am SO glad he did! This pillow brought the bath to a whole new level. I’ve been using a rolled up towel for some time and always thought it was basically the same thing. It is absolutely not the same thing. This pillow, paired with my BBW black chamomile sleep foam soap and I wash away all the Drama of the day and go to bed on cloud 9. The only thing I’d do differently was order it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pillow, does what the description says
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillow, does what the description says. Soft and comfortable for my son. Dries easily. Suctions almost too good! My only problem, is NOT a problem with the product BUT a problem with my bathroom, I have no place to dry it, so it sits on top rack of shower corner rack so it gets wet when others shower. I'm thinking of purchasing a trash can and putting it in it so it can drain.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my relaxing baths
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is the best thing to avoid having to lay back on a cold bathtub during a nice, hot bath. I was so excited about getting this and having it for my baths. My 10-year-old daughter also loves it so much she will only bath in my bathtub now LOL. The cushion is well-made, and it is thick and comfortable. The suction cups are very solidly attached, and there is no worry of it sliding down the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Puckett

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a lifesaver. My tub is not the best and neither is my back. So if I want to try and recline at all, I need some support. This is perfect. The suction cups (4 of them) work well enough to keep me supported. The mesh is soft. The configuration of the pillows is really nice. I’m super happy with it! I squeeze it out and hang it to dry and it’s good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Zimster

customer_reviews.title: Super cushy
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable bath pillow I've ever tried, it's really thick and cushy, love it. Hook for hanging up to dry is really nice too. Can't wait till our hot tub is installed so I can try it out there too!
customer_reviews.author: KHancock

customer_reviews.title: It’s dries so quickly!
customer_reviews.text: With the thickness of this most amazing bath pillow I was super concerned that it would not dry appropriately. I was completely wrong! The suction cups keep it right where I want it to be. And the neck, shoulder and back support wrap right around my body to relieve all of the tension as I’m laying in the bath! I highly recommend this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Vassar

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I thought this would be a standard pillow. I even hesitated because it was mesh (I was worried about the look). However, I was VERY surprised. This is the most comfortable pillow ever! As I laid back on it, I felt immediately relaxed due to its softness. It totally drew me in. I fought hard not to fall asleep. This is one of the best products that I've purchased in the past few months. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: No issues, but be responsible
customer_reviews.text: Appears as pictured, stays in place well. I recommend you let it dry fully and remove it from the shower/bath stall when not in use. It can easily suction to a tile wall behind a bathroom door for storage or be hung by the attached loop from a robe hook on the back of the door. I have not had any issues with it accumulating mold or mildew doing this as others have complained of.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Not good for straight tubs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am super uncomfortable in my straight-backed tub. I read somewhere that this pillow would help with that. I disagree. I found that this pillow did not help ease the discomfort of a straight-backed tub. The suction cups are strong, bu the pillow still slid down the tub and didn't really create enough of an angle to be comfortable. Also, I find the material covering the pillow to be very itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is so comfortable. It's the best bath pillow I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I love soaking in the tub and this is the best bath pillow I've ever purchased. It's very comfortable. The suction cups are secure and the pillow doesn't float up when it gets to the water line. Be sure and let the pillow dry out completely. I have gotten lazy where I've kept it attached to the tub. It started getting a little orange-y, so I soaked it in Oxy Clean and ran it through a gentle cycle in my front loader in cold water and it came out good as new. Not sure if you're supposed to do that, but I did and the pillow was like new.
customer_reviews.author: Spaderbabe

customer_reviews.title: SUPER comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I previously used a thinner, plastic-y pillow for my baths, so this pillow has been a huge upgrade for me. It is thick, cushy, and comfortable. It truly feels like a pillow. This pillow really does make the bath experience a lot more comfortable and relaxing. I HIGHLY recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is absolutely a game changer for baths! It is so comfortable, lightweight, drains easily and sticks in place. It's easily machine washable if it starts to get stained (I use a lot of colored bath bombs!). No complaints from me!1 The PERFECT addition for a relaxing bath. It's so good, my husband asked for one!
customer_reviews.author: MRT

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: My whole household LOVES this pillow! I bought it as a Christmas present for my husband, along with a bath tray and drain stopper, for him to relax. Our kids are athletes so they take Epsom salt baths often and now I see why! It was worth the price, it is durable and comfortable, the auction works great, and is very plush. Would totally buy again’
customer_reviews.author: CampSmith

customer_reviews.title: Mesh doesn’t itch your back, suction is good, headrest could be firmer but I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my bathtub! I soak often in Epsom salts so I was really looking forward to a nice cushion. The pillow stuck right on, never lost suction. I’ve used it twice now and no problems. It hangs easily in my shower to dry. The only thing that could make this better is the neck pillow having a bit more support. It’s not quite the same firmness as the back support. I like to sink low in the bathtub so this makes my head tilt back a little too far. But it’s not a deal breaker. Great self care product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great bath pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very luxurious pillow. It is thick, soft and dries fast. Unfortunately, my tub is a huge jacuzzi form the 90's and the sides are almost straight so this pilow is a bit thick. I will keep it however for my next tub or give to someone that can use it.
customer_reviews.author: LLB17350

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best bath pillow I have ever tried and it actually stays in place! I love how easy it is to clean and to dry, it is so much better than the cheesy plastic seashells that slide all over the place and offer no support. I am thinking of getting more of them for my mom and sister to try. It makes my bath time a lot more relaxing and care free and I need that in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best. Pillow. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy taking baths you need one of these! It changes the game completely. It stays in place once you put it where you want it, It is so comfortable to lean against and it's easy to clean. I fall asleep in my bed when I use this and wake up too cold water that I refill so that I can keep on enjoying how comfortable I am. That might be the only thing I don't like about this pillow, my water bill is going up! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is an absolute must have if you own a bath tub.
customer_reviews.text: I love taking bubble baths, especially when it’s cold outside but my baths have always been short. Since I’ve been using this pillow my baths have been much longer. I didn’t realize how uncomfortable I was before! The first time I used this thing I was so relaxed I almost fell asleep in the tub. When I was done I just rinsed it off in the shower and then hung it on a towel rack above the tub where all the water drained from it. I’m probably gonna take bubble baths much more often in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zainab

customer_reviews.title: Best gift EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mother-in-law as she just moved into her new home and it has a deep soaking tub. She absolutely loves this pillow---raves about it at family dinners that it's so comfortable and suctions well to the tub. May just have to buy one for me!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Becki Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Viventive Luxurious Bath Pillow Non-Slip and Extra Thick with Head, Neck, Shoulder and Back Support: Gave to my husband as part of his gift for Father's Day, and he loves it! Said it was nicely made and easy to clean, comfortable and easy to affix to the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila E. Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality; excellent service!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Viventive Luxury Spa Bath Pillow that will much better support my back and neck in the bathtub. Now I can enjoy leisurely, comfortable and relaxing hot lavender baths with epsom salts during these very cold winter evenings in the Midwest, and sleep better, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Harman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, stays in place, seems to dry well. I've had it in the tub several months without needing to wash it. No signs of mildew or odor.
customer_reviews.author: Jamille2

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this a while ago, and finally used it this morning. Why do so many of us delay self care? I loved it. It made a relaxing self-care moment all the more enjoyable because it was so comfortable. I could have stayed in much longer had it gone from the head to the tailbone area (I got out because my tailbone was getting sore -usually I get out because I am too cold because I cannot comfortable sit so submerged and because my neck gets sore). WONDERFUL bath pillow -very soft and not at all cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups seem nice but on my steep sided tub they slip down into the water. I can still get quite comfy and it is a million times better than anything else i have tried. Seems to be very high quality and it dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow!!! I have had several air pillows in the past and the never lasted longer than 6 month (I have cats that tend to put holes into things). This pillow is great because it is a supportive foam with a mesh covering. It dries quickly, hasn’t stained from my bath products, and is still in wonderful condition. If anything happens to this pillow- I would gladly buy the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift item!
customer_reviews.text: Happily surprised about the amount of cushion in this headrest. Supports neck and shoulders wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this at a friends house and thought it looked SO comfy. My husband takes a lot of baths and we had a little rectangle pillow that was jsut so/so. This is SO Much nicer. Make sure to secure it to the tub before you fill it. Otherwise it's not going to STICK well. But if follow the directions, it works fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fink

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the bath ordered
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t do reviews but ever since this quarantine life has become the new norm baths have become my self care of choice. After many baths of using three bath towels and not getting proper support and then having to wash the towels because the got wet I broke down and purchased this bath pillow. I know this is not “essential” but I’m so grateful it arrived ahead of schedule. This bath pillow is soft supportive and comfortable. If you enjoy long relaxing baths this Is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nifateria M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but the suctions don't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Once the bottom half is submerged in the water it becomes heavy and the suctions don't stay in place like I wish they would. But it is still very comfy. Easy to clean. Has a useful hanging clip for drying.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, quality pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable pillow that looks like it will be that way for some time. Dries quickly. Seller was prompt with delivery. Very satisfied. My wife wouldn't let me post a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tub Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the pleasure of using this several times and I don’t have one thing to complain about. It offers a lot of comfort and support. If you’re in the market for a tub pillow, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Histia

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck/shoulder relaxation during baths!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath pillow! I truly do. I need to soak in the bath often to help relieve my muscles and pain caused my neck and body injuries and Fibromyalgia. With this pillow, I finally don’t have to sink down in the tub just to lay my head/neck back to soak which exacerbated my issues and caused more pain. With this pillow, I can lean back on an incredibly comfortable pillow and finally get the relaxation I need. Thank you so much for your product. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sullie Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very comfortable for soaking in the tub. It is a little tricky for me to get it to stick in place, but I think it is because my soaking tub is curved. I love bath time, and this supports your head and shoulders. No more cold porcelain on the back and shoulders!
customer_reviews.author: Janene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it at 1st try. It slipped to the bottom of the tub.2nd time I did anchor the pillow better. I only have the use of my left hand and you do have to push hard to get the suction pads to stick. I had a good bath and my hair did not get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've had the inflatable pillows before, and this is so much nicer!! It's a soft cushy foam inside, with like a soft netting over it. The neck portion on it fits perfectly in the crook of your neck. Stays put, has 4 suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara S. Harden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have an oval Victoria+Lambert soaking tub and although this pillow feels luxurious it does not adhere to my tub. It is always on the tub floor and I have to maneuver placing it behind my back when using the tub...if I lean forward the pillow comes off and slides down into the water. Very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but........
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable pillow. However, like all the other pillows I've tried, the suction cups do not remain affixed to the tub as the water rises. Often just one cup sticks and the others don't.
customer_reviews.author: Ruzzie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable cushioning, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The amount of cushioning and shape this pillow provides makes it very comfortable, but I find the material pretty scratchy which makes me less excited to use it, and it is starting to stain at the bottom. When it came it was very slightly discolored but I didn't think much of it, now I'm wondering if it was used. It's okay, as I said very comfortable, but not sure I could recommend it as a truly great product.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great for my neck problems
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this pillow comfortable and easy to place in the walk in tub, but rinsing it after every use will preserve it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: After the first time washing this pillow, it got this disgusting black line and overall discoloration. I’m chucking it in the trash and looking for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jecynta O.

customer_reviews.title: Suctions work amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest I did not expect this product to work as well as it did, but holy cow is it amazing!!! The suctions are phenomenal, they stayed on extremely well. I had no issues with them coming off at all, and it is SO COMFORTABLE. So far it has held up very well, the water comes right out of the material and it hangs to dry on the very convenient hook.
customer_reviews.author: Krusso76

customer_reviews.title: Spa Bath Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought the spa bath pillow for my daughter for Christmas. She told me that after she used it for the first time she loved it! Later, her husband took a bath and used it and said he loved it also.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Boehm

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bath pillow! It is so cushy and comfortable. The suction cups are nice and strong so it doesn't budge while relaxing in the tub. The mesh bag for washing was a nice bonus to keep the suction cups and hook from getting tangled up in the other laundry.
customer_reviews.author: HollyC

customer_reviews.title: I might be super picky
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to get in the right position for me. Washed weekly and didn’t hold up as well as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Griesenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tub pillow. Exactly what I was looking for. Fits myself and my husband. Size of pillow is comfortable and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Shon

customer_reviews.title: moldy
customer_reviews.text: this started growing mold inside it quickly and I dont have a moldy bathroom. I hung it to dry. I washed it with bleach. no luck. It didnt stick very well to the tub either so although the cushion was good I could not handle the mold.
customer_reviews.author: Jmc

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bath pillows
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these bath pillows. They look great and are very soft and comfortable and easy clean too.
customer_reviews.author: P and L

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable but didn't stick very well once submerged in water. With the weight of myself leaned on it it stayed in place. Also I flipped it upside down to make it inclined for my straight backed tub. I love it now!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: best bath pillow for straight back tubs ever
customer_reviews.text: I am 4 months pregnant and have vasculitis (unrelated, im just unlucky) causing severe pains, and omg I can't say how awesome this pillow is. I have a 1980s straight back tub (and I mean, totally straight. no head space at all) it makes hot baths doable again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Viventive Luxury Spa Bath Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Comfy! It comes with a little hook on it so you can hang it up and let it air dry. There are suction cups on the back so it stays in place. Awesome if you’re looking for a relaxing bath!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Runia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am happy with this purchase. It stays sticky to my bathtub and support mu neck and head. The measurement is accurate which is important for the roller part placed in between wall and a bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Luxury tub pillow
customer_reviews.text: It helps shorten the tub (I'm really short). I took off a star because it slips down the tub sometimes even though I press the suction cups on as hard as I could. I guess my tub is very slippery.
customer_reviews.author: littlekitty1112

customer_reviews.title: Suction not the best, not good for straight back tub
customer_reviews.text: This is not great for a straight back tub. The suction cups slide very easily. The cushion is good but the outer fabric layer starts to irritate my skin after a few minutes. It does dry fairly quickly because of the fabric though.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa M

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great for the standard tub, suctions great and very comfy. I liked it souch I purchased this for a gift 2x.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Wanna luxuriate in the tub?!!!
